questionText: How many SMR tokens were minted as part of the initial token distribution?
Can SMR tokens be used to pay for transaction fees on the IOTA Rebased network?

answerOptions.answerText: Yes, just like on the former Shimmer network.
No, only IOTA tokens can be used to pay for fees.
SMR can only be used for gas fees in certain transactions.
SMR can only be used for storage deposits.

questionText: Are SMR tokens manually migrated from the Shimmer network to IOTA Rebased?

answerOptions.answerText: Yes, a manual migration is required.
No, they are automatically represented on IOTA Rebased.
Only a partial migration is needed.
They cannot be migrated to IOTA Rebased.
